Creating Value Through Responsible Sourcing

Lonza’s global Procurement team proved the value of our close partnerships with major suppliers worldwide and our robust supply chains in the face of some practical challenges in 2017. These hurdles included working around a railroad blockage in Germany that affected our site in Visp (CH) and responding to chemical supply chains disrupted by major hurricanes in the United States. teams with no material impact on the company's overall performance.
